alert.note: Alert for Coos; Douglas (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued September 02 at 11:20AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT TUESDAY... Oregon Department of Environmental Quality has issued an Air Pollution Advisory...in effect until 2 PM PDT Tuesday for Central Douglas county near Roseburg and other areas near the Tyee fire. Wildfires burning in the region combined with forecast conditions will cause air quality levels to fluctuate and could be at unhealthy levels. Smoke levels can change rapidly depending on the weather. People at risk include infants and young children, people with heart or lung disease, older adults and pregnant people. For additional information...please visit the web site at https://oregonsmoke.org
